name: Restaurant Management
title: Line Chef, General Manager
description: Created menus, daily specials and soups. Managed back staff.
responsibilities: Interviewing, hiring and firing of back staff.
accomplishments: Doubled the sales of daily specials.
Increased the sales of daily specials from under 10% to over 30% of daily sales.
learnings: Thrilling people with food is extremely rewarding.
I learned how to organize a great number of things in my head in real time.
reasonLeft: One day after dicing 50 pounds of onions in a 100 degree kitchen I decided I wnated something in an air conditioned office.
